fields.name: Beginnings Determined at the Roots (C1)
fields.value: Tighnari's Charged Attack CRIT Rate is increased by 15%

fields.name: Origins Known From the Stem (C2)
fields.value: When there are opponents within the Vijnana-Khanda Field created by Vijnana-Phala Mine, Tighnari gains 20% Dendro DMG Bonus. The effect will last up to 6 seconds if the field's duration ends or if it no longer has opponents in it.

fields.name: Fortunes Read Amongst the Branches (C3)
fields.value: Increases the level of Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft by 3.

fields.name: Withering Glimpsed in the Leaves (C4)
fields.value: When Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft is unleashed, all party members gain 60 Elemental Master for 8 seconds. If the Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft triggers a Burning, Bloom, Aggravate, or Spread reaction, their Elemental Mastery will be further increased by 60. This latter case will also refresh the buff state's duration.

fields.name: Comprehension Amidst the Flowers (C5)
fields.value: Increases the Level of Vijnana-Phala Mine by 3.

fields.name: Karma Adjudged From the Leaden Fruit (C6)
fields.value: Wreath Arrow's charging time is decreased by 0.9 seconds, and will produce 1 additional Clusterbloom Arrow upon hit.
